data.title: SCS Cloud
data.meta_description: With a focus on NetSuite and Salesforce solutions, our talented software service team is eager to help you streamline your business with a custom solution.
data.text:
Joshua Bone

VP of Business Optimization

Based in Minneapolis, Joshua Bone brings 15 years of NetSuite consulting experience to his management role. Prior to joining SCS Cloud, He specialized in consulting for other NetSuite partners, using his expertise to execute some of the most complex implementations and integrations. Today, Joshua is focused on customer success and ensuring our NetSuite delivery is truly best in class.

Certifications:

NetSuite Certified SuiteFoundation

NetSuite Certified ERP Consultant

NetSuite Certified Administrator

Advanced Revenue Management Enabled

NetSuite Certified Financial User

NetSuite Certified SuiteAnalytics User

Bobby Coffin, CPIM

Chief Operating Officer

Bobby Coffin is a certified NetSuite Consultant with broad expertise in Manufacturing and Supply Chain operations. Having worked across many distinct industries, he has a large breadth of knowledge in various manufacturing and distribution processes. Advanced Manufacturing, Standard Costing, Advanced Procurement, Supply Planning, and DRP are all areas of expertise within NetSuite that Bobby has successfully implemented for multiple clients. Pairing his technical NetSuite proficiency with industry knowledge, Bobby delivers quality implementations to all his clients, including those with complex Manufacturing processes and Supply Chains.

Certifications:

APICS CPIM

NetSuite Administrator

NetSuite SuiteAnalytics

NetSuite Financial User

NetSuite SuiteFoundations

Paul Dalton

Managing Director EMEA

SCS Cloud EMEA is headed by Paul Dalton. Based in Yorkshire in the UK, Paul has over 25 years’ management experience and a proven track record as a successful, accomplished, and pragmatic leader as part of information technology and service businesses across IT, Sales and Operations. His knowledge and experience in analyzing complex business problems, along with systems and business process design skills, give him the insight to develop exceptional solutions. With a strong customer-first mindset, Paul is particularly focused on building teams comprised of colleagues who are driven and empowered to consistently deliver successful customer outcomes.

Jessica Elias

Project Manager/NetSuite Consultant

Jessica Elias has spent over 15 years in finance and has extensive experience in strategic planning and business development. Her ability to translate facts into findings make her an essential member of the SCS Cloud team. Jessica’s career spans fields as diverse as Software Implementation, Wind Turbine Manufacturing, Non-Profit Organizations, Investments, Financial Services, Healthcare, Consulting, Real Estate, Beauty, Entertainment, Packaging and Printing/Manufacturing, and IT Distribution.

Samy Lemcelli

Lead Solution Architect

Where disproportionate solutions are available, Samy is able to take a step back and provide his customers with the solution that fits their needs the best. His love for business and software is genuine, as seen in Consult the Architect [his YouTube channel]. Like a good cup of coffee, Samy is the perfect blend between a functional and technical resource.

Certifications:

NetSuite SuiteFoundation

NetSuite Administrator

NetSuite Financial User

NetSuite ERP Consultant

NetSuite SuiteAnalytics User

NetSuite SuiteCloud Developer

Trynalee Barton

Consultant

Tryna Barton is a certified NetSuite ERP Consultant with over 20 years of experience implementing ERP solutions. Her broad understanding of NetSuite solutions, industry best practices, multiple business processes, and technology designs make Tryna a leader in the field of solution design and engagement implementation. Ensuring high-quality, integrated software solutions within the constraints of her clients’ time and budget is what Tryna does best.

Certifications:

NetSuite ERP Consultant

Jay Jurick

Consultant

With over 15 years of experience on the NetSuite platform and through working on over 80 NetSuite projects, Jay has analyzed, designed, implemented and end-user trained clients in a wide range of industries. Multiple NetSuite certifications underpin a wealth of knowledge that Jay employs to solve most any technical issue that could possibly arise on NetSuite.

Certifications:

NetSuite ERP Consultant

NetSuite SuiteFoundation

NetSuite Administrator

Annie Coogan

NetSuite Consultant

Annie Coogan is a certified NetSuite ERP Consultant with 5 years of experience in implementations, specifically in the Manufacturing, Food & Beverage, and Warehousing Distribution industries. After working at Oracle NetSuite for nearly 5 years, she joined the SCS Cloud team and has since worked on projects ranging from emerging to enterprise-level operations.

Certifications:

NetSuite ERP Consultant

NetSuite Financial User

NetSuite Administrator

NetSuite SuiteAnalytics

NetSuite SuiteFoundations

Stephen Rich

Support & Optimization Delivery Manager

With years of experience as both a NetSuite user and a consultant, Stephen’s solid foundation in NetSuite amplifies an already strong background in eCommerce and inventory management. He excels in designing processes within NetSuite that help businesses increase efficiency and also provides ongoing support necessary for long-term success.

Certifications:

NetSuite ERP Consultant

NetSuite Administrator

NetSuite SuiteFoundation

NetSuite Financial User

NetSuite SuiteAnalytics User

Ali Ahmed

NetSuite Consultant

A Certified Chartered accountant from ACCA-UK, with over 7 years of ERP experience gained at NetSuite Alliance Partner and Big 4 firm., Ali is a NetSuite Functional Consultant. He has worked on NetSuite and Oracle application implementations, post-implementation support and reviews for clients belonging to a wide spectrum of industries, including Retail, Services, Packaging, Telecom, Media, Banking, Engineering, Energy & Utilities, and Textiles.

Carlos Cordal

Senior NetSuite Consultant EMEA

Carlos Cordal is a Senior Consultant who specializes in business transformation and finance and operations processes. His successful transformation programs span industries and geographies ranging from small start-ups to FTSE 100 Global enterprises. He has extensive experience and knowledge in NetSuite, SAP, TM1, and Power BI, successfully implementing and optimizing them from end to end. Proficient in English, Portuguese and Spanish, Carlos heads our consultant team in the United Kingdom.

Scott Armitage

Senior Salesforce Consultant

Scott has over 10 years of experience on the Salesforce platform and more than 6 years experience consulting for clients across a wide range of industries. His expertise in assessing, implementing, and training end users in efficient and creative solutions enables clients to thrive. At SCS Cloud, Scott focuses on delivering seamless Salesforce solutions to ensure the highest level of client satisfaction.

Certifications:

Salesforce Administrator

Salesforce Sales Cloud Consultant

Salesforce Platform App Builder

Salesforce Service Cloud Consultant

Salesforce Advanced Administrator

Salesforce Sharing & Visibility Designer

Salesforce Data Architecture & Management Designer

Laurence Donoghue

Senior Solutions Architect

Laurence is a seasoned technology leader helping clients around the world build and scale into disruptive competitors in their respective industries. A specialist in supply chain, manufacturing, and service driven vertical markets for over 25 years, he has been a part of the NetSuite community since 2006. With an MBA in strategy and technology development from the University of Southern California, Laurence seeks to not only align your current business needs, but also assist to position your company to compete 5 to 10 years from today. Ultimately, Laurence uses his extensive experience to deliver clients long lasting sustainable benefits of the NetSuite platform that provide the right information to make consequential business decisions.

Justin Ptasnik

Support & Optimization Consultant

With a decade spent honing his ERP skills in both business operations and manufacturing roles for diverse hardware, software, transportation and Food & Beverage companies, Justin brings a unique perspective to the SCS Cloud team. When he pivoted to consulting 5 years ago, he brought this valuable experience and his engaging people skills to excel in Software Support and ERP Implementation Consulting. Before joining SCS Cloud, Justin successfully implemented over 200 customer accounts across several industries.

Waleed Khalid

EMEA NetSuite Consultant

Waleed Khalid has an Accounting and Economics Degree and is a fully certified NetSuite Consultant with over 5 years of experience working directly for Oracle NetSuite. Having helped deploy NetSuite for local start-ups and multinational companies across the EMEA, Waleed aims to make every implementation a success and to enable future optimizations that can unlock the full potential of NetSuite.

Certifications:

NetSuite SuiteFoundations

NetSuite ERP Consultant

NetSuite Financial User

NetSuite Administrator

NetSuite SuiteAnalytics

Uyanga Bulgan

EMEA NetSuite Consultant

Having studied Business and Accounting, Uyanga’s extensive background as a NetSuite end user enabled a seamless transition to become a NetSuite Administrator. Now, with nearly ten years of experience working as a NetSuite Administrator on various optimization and implementation projects, Uyanga joins the SCS Cloud team with a specialty in bridging the gap between Finance and IT departments.

Toni Sarinas

NetSuite Consultant

Toni Sarinas has a background in Accounting and Finance, having graduated with a degree in Accountancy and becoming a Certified Public Accountant Subject Matter Expert in Cash to Sale and Oneworld/Advanced Accounting. Known for her “attention to detail” approach, Toni was among the first NetSuite Support employees when it launched in the Philippines in 2007 and has 14 years of NetSuite experience in a Customer Support Analyst and Consultant role. She currently lives in Canada.

Certifications:

NetSuite SuiteFoundations

NetSuite ERP Consultant

NetSuite Financial User

NetSuite Administrator

Saahir Kapasi

Senior NetSuite Consultant

Based out of Toronto, Canada, Saahir has a background in finance and accounting and worked for Epicor and NetSuite for three years. He joined the Support & Optimization team at SCS Cloud in a techno-functional role, and to this day enjoys learning new aspects of ERP, coding and automation.

Certifications:

NetSuite SuiteFoundations

NetSuite ERP Consultant

NetSuite Financial User

NetSuite Administrator

NetSuite SuiteAnalytics

NetSuite SuiteCloud Developer II

Jesus Sanchez

NetSuite Consultant

Jesus Sanchez has 10 years of experience in the SMB space, implementing eCommerce and other ERP-like systems. At one company, an all-in-one solution was needed and NetSuite was onboarded as the solution. After a 6 month implementation, Jesus saw firsthand the efficacy of NetSuite and fell in love with the platform. Looking deeper into NetSuite’s capabilities, he soon discovered a joy and thrill he’d never known he had and turned his growing knowledge of the solution into an integral part of his livelihood. Today, Jesus brings his love of NetSuite to SCS Cloud as a NetSuite Consultant.

Janelle Moshay

Director of Delivery

As a Senior Consultant with over a decade of experience configuring complex systems, Janelle has been performing Salesforce declarative programming, administration and quality assurance since 2016. She is Salesforce Certified and Accredited, and has an extensive background in Salesforce analysis, strategy and solutions, as well as implementing new functionality. Above all, Janelle loves helping clients achieve their vision for Salesforce by advising best practice methods and delivering quality, sustainable solutions.

Eric Cosmopulos

Senior Functional Consultant

Eric Cosmopulos is a NetSuite Certified ERP Consultant with over four years of experience in product-oriented verticals. His commitment to reducing organizational bottlenecks and improving cross-functional work streams goes hand in hand with his focus on empowering end users through dashboard configuration, helping them navigate NetSuite by leveraging key visual aids that improve real-time visibility into business operations. Outside of work, Eric enjoys spending time skiing and golfing with family and friends.

Christina Cubbage

Product & Sales Implementation Consultant

Christina Cubbage has a decade of experience in the Tech Industry, where she specialized in such diverse fields as video game tech support and computerized maintenance systems. Now, Christina provides tech support for SCS Cloud products and is passionate about building relationships with clients. In her spare time, she enjoys working in her indoor garden and playing with her son and bulldogs.

Fatima Wehidy

NetSuite Delivery Manager

Fatima Wehidy is a certified NetSuite consultant with a record of successful implementations in the retail, wholesale, manufacturing and non-profit sectors. Her focus on customer service helps her deliver solutions that meet her client’s unique needs and bridge the gap between business needs and technical requirements. In her free time, Fatima enjoys staying active and spending time with her adorable dog. Whether it’s lifting weights, going for a run, or practicing yoga, she maintains a healthy lifestyle as a mainstay for staying focused and productive in both work and play.

Certifications:

NetSuite Administrator

NetSuite SuiteFoundations

Janice (Jah) Lazo

NetSuite Consultant

With a background in Finance and Accounting, Jah has over 10 years of experience in NetSuite and is an expert in Order to Cash and Procure to Pay processes. Since starting her career in the Philippines, she has become a valuable asset in the area of customer support, consulting, training, and team management. Today, Jah resides in Canada, where she enjoys learning more about the NetSuite system and helping clients as part of SCS Cloud’s growing Support & Optimization team.

Certifications:

NetSuite Administrator

NetSuite SuiteFoundations

NetSuite ERP Consultant

NetSuite Financial User

Kaylyn Pasterick

Solution Architect

Based in Denver, Colorado, Kaylyn is a certified NetSuite Consultant with a strong background in Supply Chain Management and Finance, as well as previous role experience as a Senior Implementation Consultant, Project Manager, and Functional Consultant. From manufacturing to software, she has helped many companies reach a successful Go-Live by evaluating client needs, addressing pain points, and crafting solutions that increase overall efficiency across business processes. Outside of work, Kaylyn enjoys snowboarding, yoga, and just about any sort of adventure.

Certifications:

NetSuite Administrator

NetSuite SuiteFoundations

NetSuite ERP Consultant

NetSuite Financial User

Kiliann L.-Girard

Delivery Lead

With years of experience as a consultant and project manager, Kiliann has worked with NetSuite, Salesforce, and numerous other ERPs, CRMs, PSAs, and IPAASs solutions to improve client’s business processes and optimize their operations. He has contributed to multiple projects around Europe, as well as North and South America, that range from small to enterprise-level companies. Additionally, Kiliann also possesses a unique combination of Service Industry knowledge/experience and Business Intelligence skills.

Mark Wyssbrod

Principal Consultant

Mark Wyssbrod has been a CPA for over 20 years. His exciting career has included gaining robust audit, bookkeeping, payroll and tax experience, and starting Pro@ctive CPA, an award-winning firm. After exiting the CPA industry, Mark assisted his community with startups, community non-profits and turnaround ventures, during which time he was introduced to his latest passion, NetSuite. That passion resulted in Mark becoming a NetSuite Consultant with a keen eye on technical design and best practices, and ultimately joining the SCS Cloud team. When he’s not redesigning workflows and standardizing processes, Mark enjoys reading, writing, hiking and traveling with his family.

Joe Goetschel

Smartsheet Director

Joe is a seasoned Smartsheet Solutions Consultant renowned for driving organizational excellence through innovative Smartsheet solutions. With a rich background in IT Applications Management, Field Service, and a deep understanding of Smartsheet’s capabilities, Joe brings a wealth of expertise to the table. Specializing in Smartsheet optimization, Joe excels in crafting customized solutions that streamline processes, maximize efficiency, and drive tangible results for clients. From providing comprehensive training to delivering ongoing support, Joe is committed to delivering exceptional value at every stage of the consulting journey. With a visionary approach, Joe is dedicated to helping organizations unlock the full potential of Smartsheet. By leveraging best practices and forward-thinking methodologies, Joe empowers clients to achieve enduring success and transformation. Joe partners with clients to harness the power of Smartsheet and propel their organizations to new heights of productivity and efficiency.

Certifications:

Smartsheet Core Product Certidied

Smartsheet Project Management Certified

Smartsheet System Administrator Certified

Smartsheet Control Center Lead Certified

Smartsheet Aligned Certified Sales Professional

Stefani Dreier

Business Technology Consultant

Stefani is a Business Technology Consultant based in Bozeman, MT. With years of NetSuite experience, her passion is helping customers find gaps in their processes and data, and then automate the process to build a stronger base of data integrity. With years spent in the order to cash process her knowledge lies not only within NetSuite, but also in third party integrations including Microsoft Power BI, EDI integrations, B2B platforms, shipping integrations, PLM systems, and more.

Certifications:

NetSuite Certified SuiteFoundation

Bryan Walters

Senior NetSuite Solution Consultant

Bryan is a Senior NetSuite Solution Consultant at SCS Cloud based out of Denver, CO. He has 4 years of NetSuite solution consulting experience, specializing in the Manufacturing, Wholesale Distribution, Retail and Food & Beverage industries. Bryan graduated from Iowa State University with a Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain Management and prior to working as a solution consultant, held multiple roles in Supply Chain Management for a vehicle manufactuer where he was an end user for multiple systems including NetSuite, Microsoft Dynamics, SAP, and Epicor.

Certifications:

NetSuite Certified SuiteFoundation

Najib Mohammad

NetSuite Consultant

With a strong background in software development and extensive experience, Najib is a seasoned techno-functional NetSuite consultant. Starting in varied development roles, he moved into the NetSuite field, working with multiple partners. This journey has broadened his skill set, enabling him to manage projects across different industries, from product development through to implementation and support. Driven by a passion for innovation and streamlining operations, Najib excels in creating ERP solutions that improve business efficiency and productivity.

Mark Tenn

NetSuite Consultant

Based out of Toronto, Canada, Mark is a certified NetSuite Consultant with a strong background in science and business. Prior to joining the SCS Cloud Team, he worked at Oracle NetSuite for nearly two years and has contributed to successful implementations in the financial, healthcare, energy, and non-profit sectors.

Certifications:

NetSuite Certified SuiteFoundation

NetSuite Certified Administrator

NetSuite Certified Financial User

NetSuite Certified ERP Consultant

Landon Farovitch

NetSuite Consultant

Landon is a NetSuite Functional Consultant with a proven track record of successfully implementing NetSuite for over 30+ companies across diverse industries including software, services, health and beauty, and manufacturing. Landon’s expertise in accounting and NetSuite has consistently driven significant success for his clients, Known for his personable approach and exceptional client relationship skills, Landon excels in comprehending complex business processes and seamlessly translating them into effective NetSuite solutions.

Certifications:

NetSuite Financial User

NetSuite Administrator

NextSevice Certificaiton

NetSuite SuiteFoundations

Stephen White

Senior Salesforce Consultant

Stephen is a dynamic Salesforce Consultant with extensive experience in handling complex projects, including the creation of sophisticated Salesforce automations. His expertise spans Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, and Financial Services Cloud, where he excels in delivering top-notch solutions and collaborating effectively with teams to meet client needs. His proactive mindset and deep understanding of corporate requirements enable him to provide lasting solutions that drive success. Certified as a Salesforce Administrator, Advanced Administrator, Platform App Builder, and AI Associate, Stephen showcases a strong technical foundation. Outside of his professional life, he enjoys spending time with his daughter, writing and playing music, and has a passion for video games. His unique blend of technical expertise and creative passion brings a refreshing perspective to his work, making him a valuable and engaging member of any team.

Certifications:

Salesforce Certified Administrator

Salesforce Certified Advanced Administrator

Salesforce Certified Platform App Builder

Salesforce Certified AI Associate

Vincent Lai

NetSuite Consultant

Vincent has a strong background in ERP Consulting and Financial Services, he brings valuable expertise in developing strategic solutions and effectively managing risk. Committed to surpassing expectations, he has a wealth of experience in finance and ERP consulting, overseeing numerous successful implementations, UAT, cutover, go-live support, One World implementation, and optimization projects. His proficiency in data analysis enables him to deliver valuable insights and recommendations, specializing in customized solutions and providing strategic guidance that ensures smooth transitions and enhances business processes.

Certifications:

NetSuite SuiteFoundations

NetSuite Financial User

Chris Kissner

Senior NetSuite Consultant

Chris is a skilled Senior Consultant based out of Denver, CO. He brings over twenty years of professional experience in B2B and B2C markets including: manufacturing, distribution, gaming & hospitality, HVAC and Technology in companies ranging from $1M to $80M in annual sales. For six years he ran his own marketing and technology consulting firm serving small businesseses across the country. In his previous role, he was project manager on the client-side and lead a $1M NetSuite implementation successfully. Chris has a proven track record of client success thanks to focuses on detailed process mapping, efficiency improvements and general business accumen. He has experience managing various tools including: NetSuite, SAP, Salesforce, HubSpot, SugarCRM and more. Chris brings a decades of real-world business experience and client-first focus to any project.

Eddie Zaragoza

Senior Salesforce Consultant

Eddie Zaragoza is a seasoned Senior Salesforce Consultant with a knack for turning complex client requirements into streamlined, effective solutions. With over a decade of experience in the tech industry he has managed Salesforce implementations, provided comprehensive training, and ensured data integrity while providing best practice based guidance. Eddie’s ability to navigate agile methodologies and deliver continuous improvements has earned him a reputation for excellence in client satisfaction and system optimization. His hands-on experience with a variety of Salesforce applications and tools, including CPQ, TaskRay, and DemandTools to name a few, underscores his versatility and deep understanding of the platform. When he’s not optimizing Salesforce systems, Eddie enjoys exploring new hobbies and staying active. He holds a Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration with a focus on Marketing from the University of South Florida and proudly maintains his Salesforce Administrator and Service Cloud Consultant certifications. Outside of work, Eddie loves playing soccer, indulging in dad jokes, and spending quality time with his two young children. His dynamic blend of professional expertise and personal passions makes him a well-rounded consultant who brings a unique perspective to every project.

Will Swartz

NetSuite Functional Consultant

Will is a Functional Consultant based out of New York City with a strong background in business and IT. Prior to joining SCS Cloud, he worked at Oracle for almost two years working on successful implementations for emerging businesses, and businesses in the Restaurants and Hospitality industry.

Certifications:

NetSuite SuiteFoundations

NetSuite Financial User

Allen Chow

NetSuite Consultant

Allen is a seasoned NetSuite techno-functional consultant with strong foundation in accounting and supply chain operations. With over 10 years of NetSuite experiences he has work closely with industry verticals in Apparel and Footwear (Retail), Financial/Investment Firms, Manufacturing, Software and Wholesale Distribution. Allen is dedicated to driving change and optimizing NetSuite performance and aligning your business processes with best practices to maximize efficiency.

Certifications:

Amy Jacobs

Payments Implementations & Support Consultant

Amy is a dedicated professional with nearly a decade of support and account management experience working with commercial clients. Her technical expertise is complemented by her exceptional ability to build strong and lasting relationships with clients. She excels in resolving issues promptly and efficiently, ensuring that client needs are met effectively. Amy is committed to delivering excellence and continuously improving the client experience. Her consistent and dedicated approach, coupled with her professionalism, guarantees client satisfaction and contributes to the growth of the company.

Dan Humbert

Project Manager

Dan Humbert has helped many companies through their digital transformation by implementing ERP, CRM and eCommerce platforms and applications. He’s managed projects for companies moving to Salesforce, Oracle EBS, Peoplesoft and Paylocity, integrating them into lesser-known but business-critical applications. As the technology lead for a mid-size nonprofit, Dan selected NetSuite for their finance and accounting system, planned the implementation and assembled the implementation team. Joining SCS Cloud, Dan has brought his experience working with businesses to automate and improve processes, eliminate paper and migrate data to the cloud in a secure manner.

Niko Croft

Project Manager

With nearly a decade spent managing businesses in the UK, Niko uses the direct experience and expertise he’s gained over the years to run successful implementations. He works to deliver projects on time, on budget and within scope, while also using his organizational and leadership skills to help streamline processes and create an atmosphere of maximum efficiency around any project he works on.

Patrick Claps

Delivery Lead

Patrick Claps is a 4x certified NetSuite Consultant with over 5 years of experience in implementations, serving in roles as both a consultant and project manager. With extensive experience in operations management, ERP implementations, and project delivery, Patrick joined the SCS Cloud team as a Delivery Lead, where he oversees project execution to maintain scope adherence, stringent timelines, and budgetary controls. Based in the Tampa Bay area, he enjoys staying active and spending downtime outdoors with his dog, Ludo.

NetSuite ERP Consultant

NetSuite Administrator

Nesen Moodley

Technical Consultant

Nesen Moodley has a long history of successful enterprise with ERP projects across SAP, NetSuite and other mainstream applications. After years of working with some of the largest financial industry companies, his experience with systems and data affords him the unique ability to rapidly understand SCS Cloud clients’ user requirements and implement these into the NetSuite landscape.

Certifications:

NetSuite SuiteFoundations

Adam Smith

Senior Developer

Adam Smith obtained his Computer Science degree in Florida, and has been working in front-end and back-end development since 2006. In 2016 he began developing with NetSuite and has since worked with many types of NetSuite customers and familiarized himself with many of NetSuite’s different use cases. His specialization is in automations, integrations, front end and all-in-one solutions. In his spare time, Adam enjoys developing web browser extensions and home automation software.

Certifications:

NetSuite SuiteFoundation

Zach Rumancik

NetSuite Developer

Zach Rumancik graduated summa cum laude from Palm Beach Atlantic University in 2021 with a B.S. degree in Computer Science and a minor in Biology. He has worked in front-end development since 2019 and is a highly-valued addition to the developer team at SCS Cloud. Due to a drive to learn, Zach also enjoys learning anything from coding and automation to ornithology and botany.

NetSuite Administrator

NetSuite SuiteFoundations

Suhail Akhtar

NetSuite Technical Consultant

Suhail has great interest in designing custom solutions for business specific needs. He has a Masters Degree in Software Engineering and with vast software development experience and a client first mindset. Suhail has led many implementation, optimization and support projects. He believes in continuous learning and has worked with many ERP, CRM and integration softwares.

Finton Prosser

NetSuite Developer

Finton Prosser graduated with a BS degree in computer science and a minor in business administration. He has cultivated a passion for combining his technical knowledge with an understanding of business to solve problems for clients, and since 2019 has worked with web technologies, including NetSuite. Finton has earned a SuiteFoundations certification and brings his technical expertise to SCS Cloud as a NetSuite Developer.

Certifications:

NetSuite Administrator

Benoît Boucher

Senior NetSuite Developer

A physics graduate and developer of Machine Learning algorithms, Benoit is a highly versatile resource who has held multiple sales and account positions across various industries. Today, he is certified in NetSuite, Salesforce, and many other ERP solutions. When not leveraging his NetSuite expertise for SCS Cloud, Benoit satisfies his inner gamer by building PCs and caring for his young family.

Boris Prosper

Senior NetSuite Developer

Boris is a Senior NetSuite Developer at SCS Cloud based in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. With extensive experience in solution architecture and project management, Boris excels in overseeing technical projects to ensure accuracy and quality across all deliverables. His role involves developing and leading innovative initiatives, significantly enhancing business processes and system functionalities. Throughout his career, Boris has held significant positions in the field of technology development, where he has championed the development of internal knowledge, mentored younger resources, and maintained best practices. His technical expertise has been instrumental in defining business needs, building technical solutions, and supporting client training. Educated in Cellular Biology, Physiology, and Pathology at Université Paris Cité, Boris possesses a deep understanding of complex systems, which he adeptly applies to ERP solutions, enhancing operational efficiency and business outcomes. His certifications span across NetSuite ecosystems, Stripe, and Salesforce, showcasing his versatility and commitment to staying at the forefront of technology solutions.

Elliott Weeks

Junior NetSuite Developer

Elliott holds a BS degree in Computer Science from the University of Maine. Since 2020, he has amassed a diverse skill set in web technologies across various industries. Elliott is dedicated to delivering exceptional communication, service, and impactful problem-solving to enhance client experiences. As a NetSuite Developer at SCS Cloud, he aims to leverage his versatility to adapt and thrive in the rapidly evolving NetSuite ecosystem.

Emerson Elneus

Junior NetSuite Developer

Emerson is a Junior NetSuite Developer based in Montreal. With a background in programming and web development, Emerson specializes in creating custom NetSuite solutions that go beyond native capabilities. Holding a diploma as a programmer analyst and being largely self-taught, he has focused his studies on natural sciences and computer science. Over the past two years, he has honed his skills in NetSuite, building on his experience as a programmer analyst and web developer. Known for his understanding of system architecture, coding, and integration design, Emerson delivers high-quality, efficient solutions tailored to business needs.

NetSuite Certified SuiteFoundation

Jensen

NetSuite Developer

Jensen, a seasoned NetSuite developer based in the UK, brings over 8 years of expertise in implementing and customizing NetSuite to meet diverse business requirements. Throughout Jensen’s career, he has successfully led and delivered system optimisations for clients across various industries, including hospitality, cosmetics, and quick-service restaurants. Jensen excels in delivering high-quality solution architecture by collaborating with subject matter experts to ensure the best approaches are adopted.

Certifications:

NetSuite Certified SuiteFoundation

Tom Cork

NetSuite Developer

Based in the UK, Tom is a NetSuite Developer that has 6+ years experience implementing complex integrations and customisations for his clients. He has worked with companies across many verticals and is passionate about building robust solutions for NetSuite.

Cole Werkmeister

NetSuite Developer

Cole is a NetSuite Developer based in the US with over 5 years of professional development skills and 3 years of SuiteScript, Integration, and Advanced PDF/HTML Template experience. He has created multiple customizations across different business sectors including: manufacturing, distribution, eCommerce, medical, and financial.

NetSuite SuiteFoundation

Celigo Level 4 Developer

Pablo Dominguez

NetSuite Developer

Pablo Dominguez has been working in front-end and back-end development since 1999. In 2006 he began developing with NetSuite SiteBuilder and SuiteCommerce Advanced and has been involved in both B2B and B2C and custom portals implementations. Pablo excels in developing solutions that enhance business productivity, finding creative workarounds to extend standard NetSuite functionality.

NetSuite SuiteCommerce Developer

Microsoft Cerfied Professional

Julian Saeed

Sales Manager

Julian is a seasoned sales manager with over a decade of experience specializing in selling NetSuite to a diverse range of industries, including Manufacturing, Wholesale Distribution, Food & Beverage, and Software. He excels in understanding client needs and collaborates closely with professional services teams to ensure seamless implementations, regardless of complexity. Julian’s expertise in both sales and consulting drives revenue growth and customer satisfaction, making him a trusted advisor.

Ariana Capriotti

Director of Expansion

As the Director of Expansion, Ariana leads the Partnerships, Marketing and Go-To-Marketing Strategy for SCS Cloud. With a decade of experience in these areas, Ariana is passionate about bringing new technologies and offerings to SCS Cloud’s clients and informing the public at large of the unparalleled expertise and service our consultants provide. Ariana is based in the Tampa Bay area of Florida and during her personal time enjoys outdoor activities with her husband, son and two dogs.

AC Vivian

Sales Director

AC has over 15 years of experience in software sales, including 5 years selling NetSuite as part of their Retail team. He excelled at Manufacturing and Wholesale Distribution, and following NetSuite’s acquisition by Oracle worked as a sales leader in the NetSuite partner community. Bringing his passion for complex deals to the SCS Cloud team, AC works to provide optimal service and support to current and future clients and partners.

Bahar Arapkirli

Business Development Coordinator

Bahar, a seasoned project manager based in Montreal, Canada, joined SCS Cloud to drive sales growth and foster client engagements as a business development coordinator. With expertise in IT product and client relationship management, she excels in optimizing processes and delivering tangible results. Bahar oversees new client relationships and supports the sales team, adept at improving team productivity for top-notch customer service from initial touchpoint to delivery. With over 8 years of diverse industry experience, Bahar previously contributed to revenue growth for companies of all sizes, from startups to major enterprises, in both B2B and B2C environments. Known for her strategic mindset and exceptional interpersonal skills, she manages myriad challenging tasks with ease and completes them despite all odds. Outside of work, Bahar is deeply passionate about theatre and enjoys spending time with her partner and cat, Chickie.

Paul Flanagan

Sales Director, EMEA

Paul spearheads our growth in the UK and across the EMEA region. With over 8 years of experience working directly with NetSuite, Paul excels in developing and implementing sales strategies that ensure our customers are completely supported during their review of SCS Cloud and the products and services we provide. Building out local alliances, whilst leaning on our strategic relationships with global partners, Paul is focussed on ensuring a maximum ROI for our clients. A dynamic leader, Paul is committed to fostering innovation and delivering exceptional results in the ever-evolving tech landscape.

Cristian Vargas

Partner Alliance Manager

As Partner Alliance Manager, Cristian is tasked with managing our Partner Alliance Program. His efforts focus on building enduring partnerships that foster mutual growth and expansion. With over a decade of expertise in business development and expansion, along with specialized experience in public relations and partner management, he possesses the knowledge and skills necessary to drive the growth of our relationships with partners.

Manuel Rincon

Customer Success Manager

Manuel is a multi-disciplinary Customer Success Manager based in Toronto, Canada, with a deep passion for digital transformation. He brings more than ten years of experience in fostering client relationships and ensuring their success across retail, manufacturing, and distribution industries, among others. With a diverse background spanning business technology, product development, and entrepreneurship, Manuel excels in customer-centric approaches and engages with teams at both technical and strategic levels. He has co-founded two successful and sustainable companies within the technology and communications sectors. Manuel holds a master’s degree in Engineering Innovation & Entrepreneurship from TMU, further enhancing his expertise in driving innovation and business growth.

Milan Spil

Client Success Manager

After starting with a background in data analysis and HR, Milan moved into Sales and Account Management almost fifteen years ago. Milan has extensive experience working with SMB, non-profit, marketing and SaaS clients and works to ensure that all of SCS’s clients are receiving the best service possible.

Peggy Hamilton

Administration

Peggy Hamilton has a background that includes general office administration, corporate change management, delivery of communication, efficiency seminars, customer service and support. Her particular strength is efficient project execution and ensuring smooth liaison between project team members. She is also well known for the quality of her communication and care for customers and clients.

Lucas Litwin

CEO Executive Assistant/Communicator

Lucas Litwin handles the CEO’s company and personal affairs, facilitating communication and removing distractions so the CEO can devote his time and energy to expanding SCS Cloud. He is known for taking on any project and getting it completed despite all odds.

Lisa Hanft

Finance Assistant

Originally from the New York area, Lisa’s career spans over 30 years across fields as diverse as Finance, Healthcare, Consulting, Real Estate, Importing, and a memorable stint in Fashion. Her investigative aptitude in Finance and excellent communication skills in particular make Lisa an essential member of the SCS Cloud team. She has two grown children and lives in Florida.
